parameters.name: BillOwnerId
parameters.description: The ID of the account whose data you want to query. If you do not specify this parameter, the data of the current Alibaba Cloud account and its Resource Access Management (RAM) users is queried. To query the data of a RAM user, specify the ID of the RAM user.

parameters.name: EndPeriod
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end is excluded from the time range. If you do not set this parameter, the end time is the current time. Specify the time in the format of yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return. Default value: 20. The maximum value is 300.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken. If NextToken is empty, no next page exists.

parameters.name: PeriodType
parameters.description: The time granularity at which usage details are queried. Valid values: MONTH, DAY, and HOUR.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of deduction plan whose usage details are queried. Valid values: RI and SCU.

parameters.name: StartPeriod
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The beginning is included in the time range. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format.
